Search___e54bb77431ba4df2b302c43111ff812a";(function execute() {(function execute() {
 //get from inputs passed to this block
 var search_term = vaInputs.query_term.getValue();
 var catalogIds = vaInputs.catalogs.getValue();
 vaVars.limit = vaInputs.result_limit.getValue() || '5';

 //Filter out any catalog items that should not be shown ie. Record Producers
 //create a filterMap to quickly see if item can be shown to user
 var filter_tables = vaVars.filter_tables.split(',');
 var filterMap = {};
 for (var i=0; i < filter_tables.length; i++) {
 filterMap[filter_tables[i]] = 'true';
 }

 var gr = sn_sc.CatalogSearch.search(catalogIds, '', search_term, false, false, false);
 gr.query();
 var count = 0;
 var results = [];
 while (gr.next() && results.length < parseInt(vaVars.limit)) {
 var catItemId = gr.getValue('sys_id');
 var catItemObj = new sn_sc.CatItem(catItemId);
 var category = catItemObj.getFirstAccessibleCategoryForSearch(catalogIds);
 if (!catItemObj.canViewOnSearch() || !category)
 continue;
 var catItemJson = catItemObj.getItemSummary(false, 'basic');

 if (filterMap[catItemJson.sys_class_name] === undefined) {
 results.push({
 'sys_id': catItemId,
 'title': catItemJson.name,
 'image': catItemJson.picture,
 'sys_class_name': catItemJson.sys_class_name
 });
 count++;
 }
 }
 vaVars.count = results.length;
 vaVars.results = JSON.stringify(results);

 return '';
})();})();vaInputs.__silent_ScriptedAction_e54bb77431ba4df2b302c43111ff812a=true;null;","confirm_msg_on_default_value":{"msg":"","val_for_confirm":true},"nlu_text_input":false,"nlu_confirmation_prompt":false,"acknowledge_msg":"vaVars.previous_graph_node="Contextual sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7a8654444738e1107607dffe046d43f4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ChatGPTUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ChatGPTUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ChatGPTUtils = Class.create();
ChatGPTUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    initialize: function() {},
    askChatGPT: function(message) {
        var req = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ChatGPT', 'askChatGPT');
		var temp=0.5;
		var tokens=1024;
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('temperature', temp);
       req.setStringParameterNoEscape('max_tokens', tokens);
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('prompt', message);
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('model', 'text-davinci-003');

        var response = req.execute();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var responseObject=JSON.parse(responseBody);
		var answer= responseObject.choices[0].text;
        var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		return answer;

    },

    type: 'ChatGPTUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-01-29 20:43:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>7a8654444738e1107607dffe046d43f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ChatGPTUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7a8654444738e1107607dffe046d43f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-13 07:28:22</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_cb_design_topic_83ec76187333330012d12bb43cf6a796
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_design_topic"><sys_cb_design_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><compiled_topic display_value="Search Catalog Item">ccaacd71c3a3330012d1758a7ff57ecd</compiled_topic><design_definition>{"type":"FlowTopic","triggers":[{"type":"Trigger","name":"1a63110c92a8466f8eed9ff4ec1b73f6","triggerType":"request","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"},"id":"1a63110c92a8466f8eed9ff4ec1b73f6"}],"goals":[{"name":"primary","trigger_id":"1a63110c92a8466f8eed9ff4ec1b73f6","nodes":[{"type":"StartGoal","goal_id":"primary","greeting_msg":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":""},"id":"38ce7bc97fb441d5b00c3ef4a2e89cab","name":"Start"},{"type":"TerminateGoal","goal_id":"primary","confirmation_msg":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":""},"id":"b78ba735ccc841f895b31c50b0cdb8c5","name":"End"},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {
 //get from inputs passed to this block
 var search_term = vaInputs.query_term.getValue();
 var catalogIds = vaInputs.catalogs.getValue();
 vaVars.limit = vaInputs.result_limit.getValue() || '5';

 //Filter out any catalog items that should not be shown ie. Record Producers
 //create a filterMap to quickly see if item can be shown to user
 var filter_tables = vaVars.filter_tables.split(',');
 var filterMap = {};
 for (var i=0; i < filter_tables.length; i++) {
 filterMap[filter_tables[i]] = 'true';
 }

 var gr = sn_sc.CatalogSearch.search(catalogIds, '', search_term, false, false, false);
 gr.query();
 var count = 0;
 var results = [];
 while (gr.next() && results.length < parseInt(vaVars.limit)) {
 var catItemId = gr.getValue('sys_id');
 var catItemObj = new sn_sc.CatItem(catItemId);
 var category = catItemObj.getFirstAccessibleCategoryForSearch(catalogIds);
 if (!catItemObj.canViewOnSearch() || !category)
 continue;
 var catItemJson = catItemObj.getItemSummary(false, 'basic');

 if (filterMap[catItemJson.sys_class_name] === undefined) {
 results.push({
 'sys_id': catItemId,
 'title': catItemJson.name,
 'image': catItemJson.picture,
 'sys_class_name': catItemJson.sys_class_name
 });
 count++;
 }
 }
 vaVars.count = results.length;
 vaVars.results = JSON.stringify(results);

 return '';
})()","id":"f57a38cb8b4747c182b9805253be641c","name":"Contextual Search","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}},{"type":"Decision","name":"Decision","branches":[{"type":"Branch","label":"No Item Exists","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) === 0;
})()
"},"id":"1e73792b192042fc85ffaca61e5496a0","name":"No Item Exists"},{"type":"Branch","label":"Only one item exists","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) === 1;
})()
"},"id":"c08629ebd341469299cfaef541379485","name":"Only one item exists"},{"type":"Branch","label":"More than One Item","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) > 1;
})()
"},"id":"dabec6e07c044258b79e6c0116fa4150","name":"More than One Item"}],"id":"4aa655ecd4e6430eb01a875c182438c8","goal_id":"primary"},{"type":"ImageOutputPrompt","url":{"type":"String","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 return vaVars.baseUri + results[0].image;
})()"},"alt_text":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":""},"id":"84b83233cc314bdd802e6f065dff9365","name":"Item Image","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 return results[0].image.length !== 0;
})()"}},{"type":"CarouselInputPrompt","carousel_options_script":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 var options = [];
 for (var i=0; i < results.length; i++) {
 var image = results[i].image || vaVars.Default_Image;
 options.push(
 {
 'Name': results[i].title,
 'Value': i + '',
 'Body': vaVars.baseUri + image
 }
 );
 }
 options.push(
 {
 'Name': gs.getMessage('None of these'),
 'Value': results.length + '',
 'Body': vaVars.baseUri + 'not_viewable.png'
 }
 );
 return options;
})()
","no_options_found_message":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":"gs.getMessageLang("No Records Found", vaContext.getRequesterLang())"},"id":"3b4ba420a41a4be8a43a1355faa607e2","name":"Catalog Item","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"},"variable_id":"36eb8442e7e04c3481c333bfa7cdbf2d","message":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":"gs.getMessageLang("Here's what I could find. Choose the appropriate option", vaContext.getRequesterLang())"},"skippable":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"false"},"nlu_entity_binding":{"type":"NLUEntityBinding","allow_text_input":false,"use_confirmation_prompt":true}},{"type":"Decision","name":"Decision","branches":[{"type":"Branch","label":"Picked an item","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue() != JSON.parse(vaVars.results).length;
})()
"},"id":"0b0b828d1581454b8e9f943a7a0be9c3","name":"Picked an item"},{"type":"Branch","label":"Didn't pick any item","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue() == JSON.parse(vaVars.results).length;
})()
"},"id":"ae4bb462d2584e56b284c53c5438afbf","name":"Didn't pick any item"}],"id":"c9c3a264915c4909b259c4055497bf05","goal_id":"primary"},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 var index = 0;
 if (parseInt(vaVars.count) > 1)
 index = parseInt(vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue());

 if (results && results[index]) {
 vaVars.itemId = results[index].sys_id || '';
 vaVars.item_class_name = results[index].sys_class_name || '';
 vaVars.conversational = new sn_sc.CatalogConversationHelper().hasVASupport(vaVars.itemId);
 }
})()
","id":"8311baf5c7d443b38b2a590911e673b6","name":"Get the outputs","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {
 vaVars.itemId = "-1";
})()
","id":"f98c17d60a1a4988a0fbfe80774d5f63","name":"None was chosen","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}}],"edges":[{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"38ce7bc97fb441d5b00c3ef4a2e89cab","target_node_id":"f57a38cb8b4747c182b9805253be641c","id":"c16c87ed06e54d809e5b2a8d10862cf1"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"f57a38cb8b4747c182b9805253be641c","target_node_id":"4aa655ecd4e6430eb01a875c182438c8","id":"d514c6cddf644c1a96d80828c42f8445"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"4aa655ecd4e6430eb01a875c182438c8","target_node_id":"b78ba735ccc841f895b31c50b0cdb8c5","branch_id":"1e73792b192042fc85ffaca61e5496a0","id":"1f73b7cad44e4264b7aa162c5bb0674b","name":"1e73792b192042fc85ffaca61e5496a0"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"4aa655ecd4e6430eb01a875c182438c8","target_node_id":"84b83233cc314bdd802e6f065dff9365","branch_id":"c08629ebd341469299cfaef541379485","id":"c4eb82cd60bf4a5784f1cc53f4fd0b32","name":"c08629ebd341469299cfaef541379485"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"84b83233cc314bdd802e6f065dff9365","target_node_id":"8311baf5c7d443b38b2a590911e673b6","id":"3a5f60780a7146239e138cf68a024019"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"4aa655ecd4e6430eb01a875c182438c8","target_node_id":"3b4ba420a41a4be8a43a1355faa607e2","branch_id":"dabec6e07c044258b79e6c0116fa4150","id":"c054d273d4b14f569ed33806f74403a9","name":"dabec6e07c044258b79e6c0116fa4150"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"3b4ba420a41a4be8a43a1355faa607e2","target_node_id":"c9c3a264915c4909b259c4055497bf05","id":"fbecf70b541d424dacf9817b56fd87e6"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"c9c3a264915c4909b259c4055497bf05","target_node_id":"8311baf5c7d443b38b2a590911e673b6","branch_id":"0b0b828d1581454b8e9f943a7a0be9c3","id":"1023f815f14442dfa462b550830d8958","name":"0b0b828d1581454b8e9f943a7a0be9c3"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"8311baf5c7d443b38b2a590911e673b6","target_node_id":"b78ba735ccc841f895b31c50b0cdb8c5","id":"68523d5f09fa4a7d8c7548630fca38d4"},{"type":"Edge","source_node_id":"c9c3a264915c4909b259c4055497bf05","target_node_id":"f98c17d6 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.Audit_resourcing</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Audit_resourcing</name><script><![CDATA[var Audit_resourcing = Class.create();
Audit_resourcing.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	Get_RM_Approver: function(region){
		var id;
		if(region=='east')
			{
				return "278200214701a9107607dffe046d43c3";
			}
		else if(region=='west')
			{
				return "bdde09162f64a51065ebcc96f699b60e";
			}
		else {
			if(region=='central')
				{
					return "e3500704477425107607dffe046d43c1";
				}
			/*var rm=new GlideRecord('sys_user');
			rm.addEncodedQuery('sys_id='+id);
			rm.query();
			if(rm.next())
				{
				//	return rm;
				}*/
			//return id.toString();
		}
		
		
	},
	Get_RAPL_Approver: function(office)
		{
			var ofc=office;
			if(ofc=='atlanta')
			{
				return "62826bf03710200044e0bfc8bcbe5df1";
			}
		else if(ofc=='boston')
			{
				return "2e826bf03710200044e0bfc8bcbe5de0";
			}
		else if(ofc=='chicago')
				{
					return "5408091a3b100300e81d47b334efc452";
				}
			else if(ofc=='denver')
				{
					return "a6826bf03710200044e0bfc8bcbe5de6";
				}
			
		},
    type: 'Audit_resourcing'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-15 21:14:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>63d104ed47cd69107607dffe046d4376</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Audit_resourcing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_63d104ed47cd69107607dffe046d4376</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-20 14:03:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

function p1(){
var test2 = new GlideRecord('incident');

test2.short_description='create via--'+event.parm1;

	test2.impact='1';
	test2.urgency='1';
test2.insert();
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-23 22:03:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b6871d844715e1107607dffe046d4363</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create P1Incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_b6871d844715e1107607dffe046d4363</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-23 22:23:47</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

calling topics"}]},"e54bb77431ba4df2b302c43111ff812a":{"id":"e54bb77431ba4df2b302c43111ff812a","name":"Contextual Search","script":"(function execute() {
 //get from inputs passed to this block
 var search_term = vaInputs.query_term.getValue();
 var catalogIds = vaInputs.catalogs.getValue();
 vaVars.limit = vaInputs.result_limit.getValue() || '5';

 //Filter out any catalog items that should not be shown ie. Record Producers
 //create a filterMap to quickly see if item can be shown to user
 var filter_tables = vaVars.filter_tables.split(',');
 var filterMap = {};
 for (var i=0; i < filter_tables.length; i++) {
 filterMap[filter_tables[i]] = 'true';
 }

 var gr = sn_sc.CatalogSearch.search(catalogIds, '', search_term, false, false, false);
 gr.query();
 var count = 0;
 var results = [];
 while (gr.next() && results.length < parseInt(vaVars.limit)) {
 var catItemId = gr.getValue('sys_id');
 var catItemObj = new sn_sc.CatItem(catItemId);
 var category = catItemObj.getFirstAccessibleCategoryForSearch(catalogIds);
 if (!catItemObj.canViewOnSearch() || !category)
 continue;
 var catItemJson = catItemObj.getItemSummary(false, 'basic');

 if (filterMap[catItemJson.sys_class_name] === undefined) {
 results.push({
 'sys_id': catItemId,
 'title': catItemJson.name,
 'image': catItemJson.picture,
 'sys_class_name': catItemJson.sys_class_name
 });
 count++;
 }
 }
 vaVars.count = results.length;
 vaVars.results = JSON.stringify(results);

 return '';
})()","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"001d4341fc9c4ccc8ea2f8e49a53694f":{"id":"001d4341fc9c4ccc8ea2f8e49a53694f","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"c04dbac87f894145998d671efc8507c0":{"id":"c04dbac87f894145998d671efc8507c0","stepType":"ImageOutput","name":"Item Image","url":{"value":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 return vaVars.baseUri + results[0].image;
})()","mode":"script"},"variableId":"","applicability":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 return results[0].image.length !== 0;
})()"}},"1f7a417424c949c1b0932ad5e931effd":{"stepType":"CarouselPrompt","name":"Catalog Item","prompt":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"confirmMessage":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"acknowledgeMsg":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"optional":false,"defaultValue":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"variableId":"e3c029b36c45428a99bc4db4f1dfbc44","id":"1f7a417424c949c1b0932ad5e931effd","carouselLabel":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":""},{"text":"Here's what I could find. Choose the appropriate option "},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"},"carouselItemExpression":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 var options = [];
 for (var i=0; i < results.length; i++) {
 var image = results[i].image || vaVars.Default_Image;
 options.push(
 {
 'Name': results[i].title,
 'Value': i + '',
 'Body': vaVars.baseUri + image
 }
 );
 }
 options.push(
 {
 'Name': gs.getMessage('None of these'),
 'Value': results.length + '',
 'Body': vaVars.baseUri + 'not_viewable.png'
 }
 );
 return options;
})()
","noRecordsResponseMsg":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":""},{"text":"No Records Found"},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"},"withNluUserInput":false,"skipIfFulfilled":false,"entity":"","skippable":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"3365aea11ec74cec83060013f6b11b0c":{"id":"3365aea11ec74cec83060013f6b11b0c","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"689734bc0b514500a3d0fe4c16138443":{"id":"689734bc0b514500a3d0fe4c16138443","name":"Get the outputs","script":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 var index = 0;
 if (parseInt(vaVars.count) > 1)
 index = parseInt(vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue());

 if (results && results[index]) {
 vaVars.itemId = results[index].sys_id || '';
 vaVars.item_class_name = results[index].sys_class_name || '';
 vaVars.conversational = new sn_sc.CatalogConversationHelper().hasVASupport(vaVars.itemId);
 }
})()
","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"a8f2dd82bf2f4e7c931d64f480b3ccd4":{"id":"a8f2dd82bf2f4e7c931d64f480b3ccd4","name":"None was chosen","script":"(function execute() {
 vaVars.itemId = "-1";
})()
","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}}},"edges":[{"id":"083ad223a2d54ceaadf3f9366f451362","edgeType":"Edge","source":"4994aebceb884a528c5a0fde2c892013","target":"e54bb77431ba4df2b302c43111ff812a","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"61928761a123497d89c982ec7262973c","edgeType":"Edge","source":"e54bb77431ba4df2b302c43111ff812a","target":"001d4341fc9c4ccc8ea2f8e49a53694f","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"5518347a7c4a49a792907e0619ef5d5b","edgeType":"Branch","source":"001d4341fc9c4ccc8ea2f8e49a53694f","target":"7fe3c6a1d6e94c26aa78e57466593f6f","sourcePort":"","targetPort":"","expression":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) === 0;
})()
"},"label":"No Item Exists"},{"id":"0719cd024f714c27ae47a6d358ecf38c","edgeType":"Branch","source":"001d4341fc9c4ccc8ea2f8e49a53694f","target":"c04dbac87f894145998d671efc8507c0","sourcePort":"","targetPort":"","expression":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) === 1;
})()
"},"label":"Only one item exists"},{"id":"b1e5a781dda54d63abc5b2c0a137d47e","edgeType":"Edge","source":"c04dbac87f894145998d671efc8507c0","target":"689734bc0b514500a3d0fe4c16138443","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"a8a6104af31145cf9f6555c631f28c73","edgeType":"Branch","source":"001d4341fc9c4ccc8ea2f8e49a53694f","target":"1f7a417424c949c1b0932ad5e931effd","sourcePort":"","targetPort":"","expression":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) > 1;
})()
"},"label":"More than One Item"},{"id":"41f1dc4a51c24fb6a0c1dacdf79e7a53","edgeType":"Edge","source":"1f7a417424c949c1b0932ad5e931effd","target":"3365aea11ec74cec83060013f6b11b0c","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"5e09fcbed5d84ec887de00a4548f9950","edgeType":"Branch","source":"3365aea11ec74cec83060013f6b11b0c","target":"689734bc0b514500a3d0fe4c16138443","sourcePort":"","targetPort":"","expression":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue() != JSON.parse(vaVars.results).length;
})()
"},"label":"Picked an item"},{"id":"a94df1fb3da541e7a9893395081b9acc","edgeType":"Edge","source":"689734bc0b514500a3d0fe4c16138443","target":"7fe3c6a1d6e94c26aa78e57466593f6f","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"2e0aaa55e51f4c4abeb9d92ac85c4b8f","edgeType":"Branch","source":"3365aea11ec74cec83060013f6b11b0c","target":"a8f2dd82bf2f4e7c931d64f480b3ccd4","sourcePort":"","targetPort":"","expression":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue() == JSON.parse(vaVars.results).length;
})()
"},"label":"Didn't pick any item"},{"id":"14743dd42fee47728f0279858fc579ba","edgeType":"Edge","source":"a8f2dd82bf2f4e7c931d64f480b3ccd4","target":"7fe3c6a1d6e94c26aa78e57466593f6f","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""}]}}}</graph><key_phrases/><library>true</library><live_agent>false</live_agent><name>Catalog Item Search</name><nlu_intent/><nlu_intent_label/><nlu_model/><nlu_model_label/><nlu_provider/><palette_label/><roles/><secure_custom_input_control>false</secure_custom_input_control><source_topic_id>956ab2d47333330012d12bb43cf6a75e</source_topic_id><sys_class_name>sys_cb_topic</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-13 07:19:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3e21baac478d65107607dffe046d43d8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Catalog Item Search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_cb_topic_3e21baac478d65107607dffe046d43d8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-13 07:19:11</sys_updated_on><triggerable_by_notification>false</triggerable_by_notification><type>TOPIC_BLOCK</type><variables/></sys_cb_topic><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=3e21baac478d65107607dffe046d43d8"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SharePoint_Intg_Utils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SharePoint_Intg_Utils</name><script><![CDATA[var SharePoint_Intg_Utils = Class.create();
SharePoint_Intg_Utils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
initialize: function() {},
	Create_List_Item:function(sid,lid,tname,pname,hlink){
		var req = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('SharepointOnline', 'Create_list_item');
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('site_id', sid);
       req.setStringParameterNoEscape('list_id', lid);
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('title_name', tname);
        req.setStringParameterNoEscape('proj_name', pname);
		req.setStringParameterNoEscape('h_link', hlink);

        var response = req.execute();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var responseObject=JSON.parse(responseBody);
		var answer= responseObject.id;
        var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		return answer;
		
	},
	
	Update_List_Items:function(tname,sid,lid,Iid){
	var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('SharepointOnline', 'Update list Item');
	r.setStringParameterNoEscape('title_name', tname);
	r.setStringParameterNoEscape('site_id', sid);
	r.setStringParameterNoEscape('list_id', lid);
	r.setStringParameterNoEscape('item_id', Iid);
	var response = r.execute();
	var responseBody = response.getBody();
	var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		return  httpStatus;
	},
    type: 'SharePoint_Intg_Utils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-20 12:48:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>12afff7a470961107607dffe046d43fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SharePoint_Intg_Utils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_12afff7a470961107607dffe046d43fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-08 10:21:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

Search___f57a38cb8b4747c182b9805253be641c";(function execute() {(function execute() {
 //get from inputs passed to this block
 var search_term = vaInputs.query_term.getValue();
 var catalogIds = vaInputs.catalogs.getValue();
 vaVars.limit = vaInputs.result_limit.getValue() || '5';

 //Filter out any catalog items that should not be shown ie. Record Producers
 //create a filterMap to quickly see if item can be shown to user
 var filter_tables = vaVars.filter_tables.split(',');
 var filterMap = {};
 for (var i=0; i < filter_tables.length; i++) {
 filterMap[filter_tables[i]] = 'true';
 }

 var gr = sn_sc.CatalogSearch.search(catalogIds, '', search_term, false, false, false);
 gr.query();
 var count = 0;
 var results = [];
 while (gr.next() && results.length < parseInt(vaVars.limit)) {
 var catItemId = gr.getValue('sys_id');
 var catItemObj = new sn_sc.CatItem(catItemId);
 var category = catItemObj.getFirstAccessibleCategoryForSearch(catalogIds);
 if (!catItemObj.canViewOnSearch() || !category)
 continue;
 var catItemJson = catItemObj.getItemSummary(false, 'basic');

 if (filterMap[catItemJson.sys_class_name] === undefined) {
 results.push({
 'sys_id': catItemId,
 'title': catItemJson.name,
 'image': catItemJson.picture,
 'sys_class_name': catItemJson.sys_class_name
 });
 count++;
 }
 }
 vaVars.count = results.length;
 vaVars.results = JSON.stringify(results);

 return '';

sys_update_xml.name: sys_cb_design_topic_f031beac478d65107607dffe046d4310
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_design_topic"><sys_cb_design_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><compiled_topic display_value="_PRVW__e8313e64868d65106d317e4138c2fc49">bc313e64478d65107607dffe046d434a</compiled_topic><design_definition>{"type":"FlowTopic","triggers":[{"type":"Trigger","name":"a5990c340d9f405fafec24294eb2fd40","triggerType":"request","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"},"id":"a5990c340d9f405fafec24294eb2fd40"}],"goals":[{"name":"primary","trigger_id":"a5990c340d9f405fafec24294eb2fd40","nodes":[{"type":"StartGoal","goal_id":"primary","greeting_msg":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":""},"id":"4994aebceb884a528c5a0fde2c892013","name":"Start"},{"type":"TerminateGoal","goal_id":"primary","confirmation_msg":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":""},"id":"7fe3c6a1d6e94c26aa78e57466593f6f","name":"End"},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {
 //get from inputs passed to this block
 var search_term = vaInputs.query_term.getValue();
 var catalogIds = vaInputs.catalogs.getValue();
 vaVars.limit = vaInputs.result_limit.getValue() || '5';

 //Filter out any catalog items that should not be shown ie. Record Producers
 //create a filterMap to quickly see if item can be shown to user
 var filter_tables = vaVars.filter_tables.split(',');
 var filterMap = {};
 for (var i=0; i < filter_tables.length; i++) {
 filterMap[filter_tables[i]] = 'true';
 }

 var gr = sn_sc.CatalogSearch.search(catalogIds, '', search_term, false, false, false);
 gr.query();
 var count = 0;
 var results = [];
 while (gr.next() && results.length < parseInt(vaVars.limit)) {
 var catItemId = gr.getValue('sys_id');
 var catItemObj = new sn_sc.CatItem(catItemId);
 var category = catItemObj.getFirstAccessibleCategoryForSearch(catalogIds);
 if (!catItemObj.canViewOnSearch() || !category)
 continue;
 var catItemJson = catItemObj.getItemSummary(false, 'basic');

 if (filterMap[catItemJson.sys_class_name] === undefined) {
 results.push({
 'sys_id': catItemId,
 'title': catItemJson.name,
 'image': catItemJson.picture,
 'sys_class_name': catItemJson.sys_class_name
 });
 count++;
 }
 }
 vaVars.count = results.length;
 vaVars.results = JSON.stringify(results);

 return '';
})()","id":"e54bb77431ba4df2b302c43111ff812a","name":"Contextual Search","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}},{"type":"Decision","name":"Decision","branches":[{"type":"Branch","label":"No Item Exists","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) === 0;
})()
"},"id":"b92a917d6deb4f2e8711dcffc9499965","name":"No Item Exists"},{"type":"Branch","label":"Only one item exists","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) === 1;
})()
"},"id":"84e4b1f52e3f47a0b10badc89e633763","name":"Only one item exists"},{"type":"Branch","label":"More than One Item","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return parseInt(vaVars.count) > 1;
})()
"},"id":"425e90ee401c4069b12d3a42a1b99f22","name":"More than One Item"}],"id":"001d4341fc9c4ccc8ea2f8e49a53694f","goal_id":"primary"},{"type":"ImageOutputPrompt","url":{"type":"String","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 return vaVars.baseUri + results[0].image;
})()"},"alt_text":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":""},"id":"c04dbac87f894145998d671efc8507c0","name":"Item Image","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 return results[0].image.length !== 0;
})()"}},{"type":"CarouselInputPrompt","carousel_options_script":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 var options = [];
 for (var i=0; i < results.length; i++) {
 var image = results[i].image || vaVars.Default_Image;
 options.push(
 {
 'Name': results[i].title,
 'Value': i + '',
 'Body': vaVars.baseUri + image
 }
 );
 }
 options.push(
 {
 'Name': gs.getMessage('None of these'),
 'Value': results.length + '',
 'Body': vaVars.baseUri + 'not_viewable.png'
 }
 );
 return options;
})()
","no_options_found_message":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":"gs.getMessageLang("No Records Found", vaContext.getRequesterLang())"},"id":"1f7a417424c949c1b0932ad5e931effd","name":"Catalog Item","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"},"variable_id":"e3c029b36c45428a99bc4db4f1dfbc44","message":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":"gs.getMessageLang("Here's what I could find. Choose the appropriate option", vaContext.getRequesterLang())"},"skippable":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"false"},"nlu_entity_binding":{"type":"NLUEntityBinding","allow_text_input":false,"use_confirmation_prompt":true}},{"type":"Decision","name":"Decision","branches":[{"type":"Branch","label":"Picked an item","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue() != JSON.parse(vaVars.results).length;
})()
"},"id":"28f7be0fbde649c68de3fa3efb72dca3","name":"Picked an item"},{"type":"Branch","label":"Didn't pick any item","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 return vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue() == JSON.parse(vaVars.results).length;
})()
"},"id":"e9aa4b5802b840df8a8e9a050834b083","name":"Didn't pick any item"}],"id":"3365aea11ec74cec83060013f6b11b0c","goal_id":"primary"},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {
 var results = JSON.parse(vaVars.results);
 var index = 0;
 if (parseInt(vaVars.count) > 1)
 index = parseInt(vaInputs.catalog_item.getValue());

 if (results && results[index]) {
 vaVars.itemId = results[index].sys_id || '';
 vaVars.item_class_name = results[index].sys_class_name || '';
 vaVars.conversational = new sn_sc.CatalogConversationHelper().hasVASupport(vaVars.itemId);
 }
})()
","id":"689734bc0b514500a3d0fe4c16138443","name":"Get the outputs","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {
 vaVars.itemId = "-1";
